div.p: Georg, Count of Württemberg and of Mömpelgard (Montbéliard) etc.

Our greetings to you, dear friend. We are sending you herewith some news, which you, after reading, should kindly send back to us promptly etc. Farewell in God. Dated Schaffhausen, the 4th of February, in the year 1552.
You might want to let some people see them, but please ensure they are sent back to us as soon as possible.
To our dear friend Heinrich Bullinger, preacher in Zürich.
